name: get-reservation-by-id
description: Retrieve complete details of a specific reservation using its booking ID. Use when you have a booking ID from a previous search or when customer provides their confirmation number. Returns full reservation details including status, comments, allergies, and whether it can be modified or cancelled.

path_params_schema.description: Unique booking identifier (confirmation number). This is obtained from search-reservations, get-reservations-with-phone results, or provided directly by customer as their confirmation number. Example format: '1526009' or 'bk_abc123xyz'.
